text: AHU type (RTU, ERV/HRV, indoor, custom) matches equipment schedule and control sequences
Shop drawings approved and include unit layout, airflow rating, fan type, coil details, electrical info
Structural coordination complete: roof openings, curbs, housekeeping pads, and access clearances
Unit delivered per submittal: correct model, voltage, handing, factory options
Filters, belts, motors, and coils protected and undamaged
Roof curbs level, insulated, weatherproofed, and sized to match unit
Unit installed plumb and level; vibration isolators properly seated
Duct connections sealed, insulated, and leak-tested
Condensate piping trapped, sloped, insulated, and drained to approved point
Access panels and filters accessible for maintenance
DDC/BAS wiring landed; sensors and safeties (e.g., freeze stat, smoke detector) installed per drawings
Fan rotation, airflow, and vibration verified
Heating/cooling coils piped per spec with proper valves, strainers, unions
Motor amperage and voltage balanced across phases
Controls tested: start/stop, alarms, airflow switches, economizer function
TAB (Testing, Adjusting, Balancing) complete, airflow measured within tolerance
O&M manuals, warranty, start-up form submitted
AHJ/mechanical consultant signoff and functional acceptance

id: • Manufacturer Specs: Trane, Carrier, Lennox, Daikin, York, Nortek, Swegon
